function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective information transparency and trust in information","Impact":"Inefficient management of health pandemics and disasters due to lack of reliable information","Mitigation":"Implementing technologies to improve information transparency and trust, and establishing governance models that promote open and collaborative information sharing","Technologies":"Blockchain for immutable information, open data platforms for transparency, data analytics for reliable information","People":"Public administrators, citizens, stakeholders","Owner":"Local government, public administrators, technology experts"},{"Description":"Lack of citizen participation and engagement in co-creation of solutions","Impact":"Ineffective management of health pandemics and disasters due to lack of input from the community and stakeholders","Mitigation":"Implementing technologies and governance models that promote citizen participation and engagement, and integrating their inputs in public decisions","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, participatory decision-making tools, social media for engagement","People":"Citizens, stakeholders, local government","Owner":"Local government, community leaders, stakeholders"},{"Description":"Inadequate governance models for managing health pandemics and disasters","Impact":"Inefficient response to health pandemics and disasters due to outdated governance models","Mitigation":"Reforming governance models to be more open, collaborative, and participative, and implementing technologies that support these models","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparency, open data platforms for information sharing, data analytics for decision-making","People":"Public administrators, citizens, stakeholders","Owner":"Local government, policymakers, technology experts"}]}
